commit.message:
Updates stringToColor specifications

Updates stringToColor specifications to integrate a reference to CSS Color Module 4 for color names and hexadecimal notation.

Moves jtreg tags to the class declaration

Comment with tags isn't collapsed when viewed in an IDE if it's placed before the class declaration.

Import order - Comments

- Corrects import declaration order.
- Removes comments

Corrects Licence Header.

Removes Classpath exception.

Misalignment comment delimiters.

Corrects a misalignment of a comment delimiter.

Simplification, typos, unnecessary conversion.

Simplifies cyan issue description.
Corrects typos.
Removes an unnecessary to lower case conversion.

Update src/java.desktop/share/classes/javax/swing/text/html/CSS.java

Co-authored-by: Alexey Ivanov <70774172+aivanov-jdk@users.noreply.github.com>

Author tag, Modifier, Returned value.

Removes the last added author tag.
Returns the Color instance from the map if there's one.
Renames colorNamed Object to colorNames.
Adds final modifier to colorNames.

Update and rename test/jdk/javax/swing/text/html/CSS/JDK8292276MissingColorNamesInCSS/JDK8292276MissingColorNamesInCSS.java to test/jdk/javax/swing/text/html/CSS/MissingColorNames.java

Removes author tag.
Renames this class.
Moves the file to the CSS folder.
Corrects some variable declarations.
Renames some variables according Java usages.
Corrects a typo.

Update test/jdk/javax/swing/text/html/CSS/JDK8292276MissingColorNamesInCSS/JDK8292276MissingColorNamesInCSS.java

Missing space.

Co-authored-by: Alexey Ivanov <70774172+aivanov-jdk@users.noreply.github.com>

Error in comment.

Sync. comment with code : "fails ... if stringToColor(null) doesn't return null".

Whitespace errors

Removes whitespaces.

Null value - Opaque color declaration 

Fixes handling of null argument and simplifies opaque color declarations.

Adds a test for null value.

The stringToColor method accepts null argument and must returns null.

Adds transparent and RGB case insensitive tests.

When <rgb()> and <rgba()> values contains at least an uppercase character, getAttribute returns null.
When using 'transparent' keyword getAttribute returns null.

Unused import and String.isEmpty()

1. Removes `TreeMap` unused import.
1. Replaces `str.length() == 0` with `str.isEmpty()`.

Returns new Color. RGB functions case insensitive.

Preserves previous behaviors. Each method call creates a new instance of Color.
RGB functions should be treated as case insensitive.

Whitespace Error 

Removes trailing whitespace.

Removes whitespace.

Remove a whitespace at the end of the file

Rename test/jdk/javax/swing/text/html/CSS/JDK8292276MissingColorNamesInCSS.java to test/jdk/javax/swing/text/html/CSS/JDK8292276MissingColorNamesInCSS/JDK8292276MissingColorNamesInCSS.java

Move the test case in its repository.

Test case for JDK-8292276

Adds a jtreg test case that fails before JDK-8292276 patch and passes after.
Test the Cyan color name.
Cyan is the missing color name that originates the PR JDK8292276 : Missing Color NamesIn CSS.
Cyan name, as most color names Colors defined in CSS Color Module Level 4, is not referenced in CSS.java.
This test fails, if getAttribute doesn't return a cyan Color Object.
When a color name is missing getAttribute returns a black Color Object.

Adds to CSS.java the missing color names.

Adds to CSS.java, the missing color names defined by :
CSS Color Module Level 4
W3C Candidate Recommendation Snapshot, 5 July 2022
[7.1 Named Colors](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-color-4/#named-color)
- Updates, Copyright year.
- Adds relative imports.
- Replaces, if ... then ... else statements with a Map called "colorNamed".
  Code is more readable and easy to maintain.
  After tests, TreeMap seems slower than Map. Results are available at scientificware#12 (comment).

Warning : The Previous JDK CSS Orange Color is different from CSS Color Recommendation.

Adds to CSS.java the missing color names.

Adds to CSS.java, the missing color names defined by :
CSS Color Module Level 4
W3C Candidate Recommendation Snapshot, 5 July 2022
[7.1 Named Colors](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-color-4/#named-color)
- Updates, Copyright year.
- Adds relative imports.
- Replaces, if ... then ... else statements with TreeMap called "colorNamed".
  Code is more readable and easy to maintain.
  After tests, HashMap seems slower than TreeMap. Results are available at https://github.com/scientificware/jdk/issues/12#issuecomment-1213978168.

Warning : The Previous JDK CSS Orange Color is different from CSS Color Recommendation.

Adds to CSS.java the missing color names.

Adds to CSS.java the missing color names defined by :
CSS Color Module Level 4
W3C Candidate Recommendation Snapshot, 5 July 2022
[7.1 Named Colors](https://www.w3.org/TR/css-color-4/#named-color)
